name: W-Man's day off
description:
W-Man hates M-Man but loves W's

Help him on his day off by completing the minigames

*warning, flashes might get intense*

Current state:

  • 7 playable minigames
  • increasing difficulty
  • highscore tracking

Planned:

  • more goofier minigames
  • more sounds
  • more animations
  • Sprite changes
  • beter UI
